FuncDef: This command specifies the forwarding class and profile state of an egress policed packet that is to be mapped to another forwarding class and profile, where the profile state is that of the resulting profile after the packet has been processed by the egress policer.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies one of the eight forwarding classes supported by the system. Values-be, l2, af, l1, h2, ef, h1, nc.
Specifies one of the egress packet profile states. Values-exceed, in, inplus, out.
